alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 07 at 4:37AM CDT until April 08 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT TODAY FOR COASTAL ALABAMA DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR COASTAL ALABAMA AND THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND DRY FUELS... ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT TODAY FOR COASTAL ALABAMA DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON FOR COASTAL ALABAMA DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 6 PM CDT this evening. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued. This Fire Weather Watch is in effect Friday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 261, 262, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WIND...Westerly to northwesterly 13 to 17 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Falling to 22 to 27 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
